'''13th Lab''' is a Swedish {{w|computer vision|computer vision studio}} based in {{w|Stockholm|Stockholm, Sweden}}.<ref>{{cite
|url=https://www.gpbullhound.com/articles/13th-lab/|title=The computer vision platform for mobile devices.|website=GP Bullhound|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20250712130531/https://www.gpbullhound.com/articles/13th-lab/}}</ref><ref>{{cite
|url=https://www.linkedin.com/company/13th-lab|title=13th Lab|website=LinkedIn}}</ref> The company is responsible for developing ''[[Minecraft Reality]]''.

== Applications developed ==
13th Lab has developed and published one application, ''[[Minecraft Reality]]'', in collaboration with [[Mojang Studios]].<ref>{{cite
|url=https://web.archive.org/web/20121128043237/http://minecraftreality.com/|title=Minecraft Reality}}</ref> It was released on November 25, 2012, for {{w|iOS}} and {{w|iPad}} devices.<ref>{{cite
|url=https://web.archive.org/web/20121127183203/http://mojang.com/2012/11/announcing-minecraft-reality-for-ios/|title=Announcing Minecraft Reality for iOS|author=Owen|date=November 25, 2012}}</ref>
